item.title: Why Managed IT Services Are So Popular
item.description:
The way businesses use information technology services has changed significantly. Instead of managing everything themselves, many companies are turning to managed IT services. This shift is driven partly by the growth of cloud computing and partly by budget limitations in the wake of the recent recession. Whether due to economic factors or technological advances, businesses are increasingly opting for IT services delivered through colocation, cloud computing, or managed network services...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/why-managed-it-services-are-so-popular/

item.title: Computing In The Cloud
item.description:
The term “cloud computing” has become ubiquitous, but what does it entail and what are its advantages over traditional data centers? Initially, cloud computing provided access to a network of computers for tasks that exceeded the capabilities of individual resources. A prime example is the SETI@Home program, which harnesses the idle processing power of countless personal computers connected through the internet to analyze radio telescope data in search of extraterrestrial life...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/computing-in-the-cloud/
